actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Hearings Held by Subcommittee on Hospitals and Health Care Prior to Referral (Mar 7, 84).
Referred to Subcommittee on Housing and Memorial Affairs.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Housing and Memorial Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 5010 of title 38, United States Code, to clarify the time for submission of the Comptroller General's report required by that section.

summary.text: Amends the operation of medical facilities provisions of veterans' benefits to direct the Comptroller General to report to the appropriate congressional committees on the compliance of the Director of the Office of Management and Budget in providing the Veterans Administration with a funded personnel ceiling within 15 days of the end of the 30 day period within which the Director must certify such ceiling.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5010 of title 38, United States Code, to clarify the time for submission of the Comptroller General's report required by that section.
